column5: A group of us Pierre boys are heading up to Eagle lake in Manitoba June 7-11. anyone got any advice for us on what to expect? Is the ice out up there yet?

Eagle Lake is a big lake with a lot of resorts on it. You will probably run into a lot of other boats. I was there in 95 and hit the may fly hatch and never caught a walleye. Im sure the fishing will be ok if you dont hit mayflies, but there will be a lot of other boats around all the hot spots. Good Luck!
